pages.title: Metite
pages.text: Metite is a foreign metal with incredible pressure resistance. It is perfect for objects that may visit an area with high compression.$(p)It will be instrumental in beginning your interstellar travels.

pages.title: Obtaining Metite
pages.text: $(item)Metite Ore$() can be found within $(thing)Meteors$() that have crashed to Earth, or inside $(thing)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining Metite Ore will require a $(item)Netherite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 4) or better, and will result in between 1 and 3 $(item)Metite Clusters$() which can each be smelted to obtain a $(item)Metite Ingot$().

pages.title: Usages
pages.text: Metite can be made into standard $(thing)tools$() and $(thing)armor$(), though it isn't particularly effective in these areas.$(p)Instead, you'll primarily want to use Metite to create $(thing)Rocket Parts$() and $(thing)Space Suits$().

pages.title: Stats
pages.text: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 2$(br)Base Durability: 981$(br)Mining Speed: 14$(br)Attack Damage: 5$(br)Enchantability: 5$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 15$(br)Total Defense: 14$(br)Toughness: 0$(br)Enchantability: 7
